creator: ogi@tower.3.bg
text:
I searched the whole web and found only the links I mailed to
http://bugs.debian.org/89484

Namely:
http://www.opennet.ru/base/patch/suexec_pam.txt.html
http://mirrors.sunsite.dk/gentoo-portage/net-www/apache/files/suexec_pam_gentoo.patch

(The second link points to the same patch, only that it is integrated into
Gentoo distribution.)

My question is what do you think about adding PAM support for suEXEC?
